name: Remembrance of Things Past
description:
Hi, this is my work with Jumo as our walking simulator assignment.

It is a story based on the novel of August Strindberg, one of my favorite high school  literature articles.

For all the interaction please press E, if it doesn't work, try again.

You can use Esc to quit the game at anytime but the game won't be saved.

Thanks for our friends who support the voice part!

Enjoy our game!
